tickets.desc: Understand and simulate all analog parts

cards.text: A Simple model is available in LT spice Files including Charge amplifier and Signal conditioner @Mohammad, Please review it and improve
cards.name: Sasan

tickets.desc: make a list of sensors in the market with theirs specs and possible prices etc.
tickets.name: Sensors in marker

cards.text: Look at Wilcoxon, Bruel& Kjaer, PCB Piezotronics. A full list of all Piezo manufacurers with TEDS is available in IEPE website via TEDS manufacturer ID
cards.name: Sasan

cards.text: A few examples are in the SPDS document. @Ramitin please make an overview with specs
cards.name: Sasan

cards.text: Please try to find IEEE standard number 1451.4

cards.text: Please try to make an overview of typical cristalls that we can use for sheer mode Accelerometer design

cards.text: Started with a rough design, Power is missing, Current source is missing, protection for Sensors are missing
cards.name: Sasan

cards.text: one page for high level specifications is added to the IEPE_SPDS document

desc: Here we still don't have an ADC, but we only have Digital interface like Bruel & Kjaer, to read TEDS, set gains, and filters.
name: Different Versions of Boards

cards.text: We can start with ESP32 V1 Wroom as SPI master
cards.name: Sasan

cards.text: Lets start with Breul_Kjaer_10k_full_device.pdf in readings to create UI specs, Back end should be just what is necesasry for ESP32 Serial interface to Windows. We can use HTML for UI, very common in Precision mechatronics buisness
cards.name: Sasan
